name: discover-commands
description: Search CLI commands by keyword or capability. Returns command syntax, parameters, and examples. Use before execute-read-command or execute-write-command. Tip: Use format='json' with detail='full' for structured parameter info.

query.description: What you want to do (e.g., 'create person', 'add to list', 'log meeting')

detail.description: Detail level (JSON format only): list (names only), summary (+ description), full (+ parameters + examples). Text format always includes parameters.

format.description: Output format: text (compact pipe-delimited, recommended) or json (structured but verbose)
